# Watery Death (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | [[Blibdoolpoolp]], Umberlee |

**Granted Powers:** You gain the ability to *smite* any nonaquatic creature once per day with one normal melee attack. You add your Wisdom bonus to your attack roll and deal 1 extra point of damage per divine spellcaster level.

**Watery Death Domain Spells**

**1 [[Entangle (Spell)|Entangle]]:** Plants entangle everyone in 40-ft. radius.

**2 Mark of the Outcast:** Subject takes –5 penalty on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] and [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks and –2 penalty to AC.

**3 [[Control Water (Spell)|Control Water]]:** Raises or lowers bodies of water.

**4 Rushing Waters**\***:** Wave makes bull rush attack.

**5 [[Dehydrate (Spell)|Dehydrate]]:** Deals Con damage to target.

**6 [[Drown (Spell)|Drown]]:** Subject immediately begins to drown.

**7 [[Contagious Fog (Spell)|Contagious Fog]]:** 30-ft.-radius cloud of fog inflicts disease.

**8 [[Horrid Wilting (Spell)|Horrid Wilting]]:** Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.

**9 [[Drown, Mass (Spell)|Drown, Mass]]:** As *[[Drown (Spell)|drown]]*, but affects 1/level subjects.
